name: HTKDragAndDropCollectionViewLayout
summary: UICollectionViewLayout subclass that provides Drag and Drop functionality. Unique in that it does not use a 'ghost' or 'dummy' cell. iOS 7+.
description: Custom UICollectionViewLayout that works together with a custom UICollectionViewCell to provide drag and drop for a UICollectionView. Works just like UITableView drag and drop. What's unique about this approach is that it does not need to create a "ghost" or "dummy" cell to provide the drag and drop functionality. I believe this method is simpler and less complex for the majority of use cases.
